dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your clinic today.
dashboard.subtitle: Manage clinic appointments and schedules

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.subtitle: Manage clinic appointments and schedules
appointments.pleaseLogin: Please log in to view and manage appointments.
appointments.autoRedirect: You will be redirected to the login page automatically.

users.title: Users
users.subtitle: Manage users and access
users.manageUsers: Manage clinic users and staff members

pets.title: Pets
pets.subtitle: Manage pet information
pets.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this pet?
pets.deleteConfirmBulk: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} pets?

petCases.title: Pet Cases
petCases.subtitle: Manage medical cases
petCases.accessErrorMessage: Unable to determine your clinic. Please contact support or try accessing pet cases from a clinic-specific page.
petCases.errorLoadingCasesDescription: An error occurred while loading cases

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage application settings
settings.loadErrorDescription: There was an error loading the settings. Please try refreshing the page.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your Borzolini Admin account
login.checkCredentials: Please check your credentials and try again.
login.validEmailAddress: Please enter a valid email address
login.passwordMinChars: Password must be at least 8 characters

roleDemo.title: Role Demo
roleDemo.subtitle: Test different user roles
roleDemo.adminDescription: Admin: Full access to all features including user management, clinics, and API health.
roleDemo.veterinarianDescription: Veterinarian: Access to their schedule, appointments, patients, and cases. No access to user management or clinics.
roleDemo.staffDescription: Staff: Basic access to schedule, appointments, pets, and cases. No administrative features.
roleDemo.patientDescription: Patient: Limited access to their own appointments, pets, and cases. No access to administrative features.
